workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4161575239111536 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.35649372936100393 --weight-decay 0.00040746063165519674 --lr 0.0004693454691774383 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 55507 --max-lr 0.0008970399897448909 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.17040382641596585 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.0006420000674326465 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
